verses.verse: There was a <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H347>Job.<s%> That <S%H376>man<s%> was blameless and <S%H3477>upright,<s%> and <S%H376>one<s%> who <S%H3373>feared<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5493>turned<s%> away from <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
There were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

His <S%H4735>possessions<s%> also were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1581>camels,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> female <S%H860>donkeys,<s%> and a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5657>household;<s%> so that this <S%H376>man<s%> was the <S%H7227>greatest<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

His <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and held a <S%H4960>feast<s%> in the house of <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> on his <S%H3117>birthday;<s%> and they <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for their <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H269>sisters<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to drink with <S%H8354>them.<s%>

It was <S%H3117>so,<s%> when the days of their <S%H4960>feasting<s%> had run their <S%H5362>course,<s%> that <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> <S%H7925>them,<s%> and rose up early in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them <S%H347>all.<s%> For Job <S%H559>said,<s%> "It may <S%H194>be<s%> that my <S%H1121>sons<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and <S%H1288>renounced<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in their <S%H3824>hearts.<s%>" <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> this <S%H3117>continually.<s%>

Now it happened on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3320>present<s%> themselves before <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that <S%H7854>Satan<s%> also <S%H935>came<s%> among <S%H8432>them.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> <S%H370>"Where<s%> have you <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H7854>from?<s%>" Then Satan <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "From going back and <S%H7751>forth<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and from walking up and down in <S%H1980>it.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> "Have you <S%H7760>considered<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H347>Job?<s%> For there is none like him in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> a <S%H8535>blameless<s%> and an <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> who <S%H3373>fears<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and turns away from <S%H7451>evil.<s%>"
Then <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Does <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H2600>nothing?<s%>

<S%H7753>Haven't<s%> you made a hedge around <S%H1157>him,<s%> and around his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and around all that he <S%H5439>has,<s%> on every side? You have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and his <S%H4735>substance<s%> is <S%H6555>increased<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
<S%H199>But<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5060>now,<s%> and touch all that he <S%H1288>has,<s%> and he will renounce you to your <S%H6440>face.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> <S%H3027>"Behold,<s%> all that he has is in your power. Only on himself <S%H7971>don't<s%> put forth your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>" So <S%H7854>Satan<s%> went <S%H7971>forth<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

It fell on a <S%H3117>day<s%> when his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H1060>eldest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%>

that there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> to <S%H347>Job,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H1241>oxen<s%> were <S%H2790>plowing,<s%> and the <S%H860>donkeys<s%> <S%H7462>feeding<s%> beside <S%H3027>them,<s%>

and the <S%H7614>Sabeans<s%> <S%H5307>attacked,<s%> and took them <S%H3947>away.<s%> <S%H5221>Yes,<s%> they have killed the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and I alone have <S%H4422>escaped<s%> to tell <S%H5046>you.<s%>"

While he was still <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> there also <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H559>another,<s%> and said, "The <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5307>fallen<s%> from the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and has burned <S%H1197>up<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and the <S%H5288>servants,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H4422>them,<s%> and I alone have escaped to tell <S%H5046>you.<s%>"

While he was still <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H559>another,<s%> and said, "The <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>bands,<s%> and <S%H6584>swept<s%> down on the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> and have taken them <S%H3947>away,<s%> <S%H5221>yes,<s%> and killed the <S%H5288>servants<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and I alone have <S%H4422>escaped<s%> to tell <S%H5046>you.<s%>"

While he was still <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> there <S%H935>came<s%> also <S%H559>another,<s%> and said, "Your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H1060>eldest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%>

and <S%H935>behold,<s%> there came a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5676>from<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H5060>struck<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and it <S%H5307>fell<s%> on the young <S%H5288>men,<s%> and they are <S%H4191>dead.<s%> I alone have <S%H4422>escaped<s%> to tell <S%H5046>you.<s%>"

Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H4598>robe,<s%> and <S%H1494>shaved<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6174>"Naked<s%> I came <S%H3318>out<s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H990>womb,<s%> and <S%H6174>naked<s%> shall I <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H3068>there.<s%> Yahweh <S%H5414>gave,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has taken <S%H3947>away.<s%> <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"
In all <S%H347>this,<s%> Job did not <S%H2398>sin,<s%> nor <S%H5414>charge<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> with <S%H8604>wrongdoing.<s%>
